executive_summary.heading: Executive Summary
executive_summary.body: Weekly attention summary for 3 ZIP codes covering Feb 19–Feb 26, 2026. Total clusters: 65, total signals: 168. Per-ZIP states: ZIP 07060: QUIET, ZIP 07062: QUIET, ZIP 07063: QUIET.

methodology.heading: Methodology
methodology.body: Signals are collected from RSS feeds (news, community, advocacy), clustered using HDBSCAN (min_cluster_size=2, metric=euclidean) on sentence-transformer embeddings (all-MiniLM-L6-v2, 384-dim). Cluster strength uses exponential time-decay (72h half-life). Safety buffer enforces 24h delay, 3+ signals, 2+ sources, volume >= 1.0. This report is tier 1 with 24h delay.

analysis.heading: Analysis
analysis.body: Top NLP keywords: deportation, cities, raid, judge, immigrant, arrests, morristown, after, detention, list. Trend direction: increasing.

confidence.heading: Confidence Assessment
confidence.body: Based on 168 signals from 65 clusters. Confidence is proportional to signal volume and source diversity.

recommendations.heading: Recommendations
recommendations.body: Continue routine monitoring. Review any ELEVATED_ATTENTION or HIGH_ATTENTION ZIPs.
